description: Now that Breton MacQueen has arrived to the festivities, Violet and Breton continue their attack on Fluffy’s dick and balls while dominating him with their sweaty socks that have been walking around the AVN Convention room floor all day. As soon as the both of them have had all their fun, they cover Fluffy’s new Chastity device with Breton’s sweaty sock and toss him outside into the hallway. They were nice enough to even toss him the key to the Chastity Device, but too bad that with Fluffy’s hands still cuffed behind his back, the Chastity key is going to be useless.
title: AVN Creeper Gets The Violet Doll And Breton MacQueen Treatment
